forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High around 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly in the morning. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High 13C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. Windy. High 56F. Winds SE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers and wind following a period of rain early. Low 9C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers late. Low 48F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain ending overnight. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.
